boat.full_description: Traditional Gaff cutter. Pole mast. Topsail. No sheet winches. Galvanised rigging with dead eyes and lanyards. 9 foot reeving bowsprit. Teak laid deck. Handspike anchor windlass.
boat.name: Polly of Skippool
boat.short_description: Very traditional 10 ton cutter.  Winner of CB Trad class award 2018.  Rig heavily influenced by Dyarchy.
